params._usedAmount: Amount of fees to be used as interest for the Loan

params._newFeesAmount: new Amount of fees paid by the Borrower

params._amount: Amount of the underlying token for this loan
params._feesAmount: Amount of fees (in the underlying token) paid by the borrower

params.killerRatio: Percentage of the fees to reward to the killer (scale 1e18)

ExpandLoan(address,address,uint256).notice: Event when the fee amount in the loan is updated

StartLoan(address,address,uint256,uint25.notice: Event emitted when the Loan starts

amount().notice: Amount of the underlying token in this loan

borrower().notice: Address of the borrower to delegate the voting power

closeLoan(uint256).notice: Closes a Loan, and returns the non-used fees to the Borrower

expand(uint256).notice: Increases the amount of fees paid to expand the Loan

feesAmount().notice: Amount of fees paid for this loan

initiate(uint256,uint256).notice: Starts the Loan and Delegate the voting Power to the Borrower

underlying().notice: Address of the udnerlying token for this loan
